mapper.select: SELECT tc.clue_id, tc.name, tc.gender, tc.create_time, tc.age, tc.weixin, tc.qq, tc.phone, tc.level, tc.subject, tc.status, tc.fail_count, tc.next_time, tch.channel_name, tas.create_by as allocator, ta.`name` as activity_name, ta.info as activity_info, tas.user_name as OWNER, tas.create_time as belongTime FROM tienchin_clue tc LEFT JOIN tienchin_activity ta on tc.activity_id=ta.activity_id LEFT JOIN tienchin_channel tch on tc.channel_id = tch.channel_id LEFT JOIN tienchin_assignment tas on tc.clue_id = tas.assign_id and tas.latest=TRUE WHERE tc.clue_id=#{clueId} and tas.type=0
